name: Space+
description:
Hey !

Here is my Ludum Dare 40th compo entry.
The theme was "The more you have, the worse it is."

Yeah, I don't really fill the theme.
The idea was that the map becomes bigger and bigger but your move possibilites fewer and fewer :)

Hope you'll have some fun ! :)

SP: Extract the zip and then run the jar file (needs java and resources folder though).
